title: BRIEF-Gold Road Resources Says Commercial Production Was Attained At Gruyere Gold Mine
text:
BRIEF-Gold Road Resources Says Commercial Production Was Attained At Gruyere Gold Mine

Commodities 44 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 21:11)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Gold Road Resources Says Commercial Production Was Attained At Gruyere Gold Mine Oct 9 (Reuters) - Gold Road Resources Ltd : * COMMERCIAL PRODUCTION WAS ATTAINED AT END OF SEPTEMBER 2019 AT GRUYERE GOLD MINE * FINAL FORECAST CAPITAL COST FOR GRUYERE GOLD MINE REMAINS WITHIN PREVIOUSLY ANNOUNCED A$621 MILLION * 2019 GUIDANCE FOR GOLD PRODUCTION AT GRUYERE GOLD MINE ANTICIPATED AT UPPER END OF RANGE OF 75,000 TO 100,000 OUNCES

BRIEF-Gold Road Resources Says Commercial Production Was Attained At Gruyere Gold Mine
description: BRIEF-Gold Road Resources Says Commercial Production Was Attained At Gruyere Gold Mine
